name: Dark waters
description:
Dark waters is a relaxing game where you dive depper and deeper in the water, discover new fish species and eat others to survive.

There’s no defined end or goal, so feel free to bail once you’ve seen the sights and sounds and hopefully had a good time playing.

Controls:

- Move using the mouse

- Left-click to go faster

- Mouse scroll to go rise or dive

Enjoy the sound and music, and we hope you'll have a great moment !
